body_html: This can already be done with more flexibility using Dataset.map(lambda x: tf.pad(...)), so I don't think there's any need at the present time to extend Dataset.padded_batch() to support it.
body_text: This can already be done with more flexibility using Dataset.map(lambda x: tf.pad(...)), so I don't think there's any need at the present time to extend Dataset.padded_batch() to support it.
body: This can already be done with more flexibility using `Dataset.map(lambda x: tf.pad(...))`, so I don't think there's any need at the present time to extend `Dataset.padded_batch()` to support it.
